sentences.en: "Run, Katherine. For pity's sake run!" he screamed.
sentences.cn: “跑，凯瑟琳，快跑！”他尖叫道。

sentences.en: "What a pity," Graham said with a hint of sarcasm.
sentences.cn: “太遗憾了，”格雷厄姆略带挖苦地说道。

sentences.en: A pity we can’t find the guy who did it.
sentences.cn: 真遗憾我们找不到那个干了这件事的家伙。

sentences.en: But my world isn't your world, more's the pity.
sentences.cn: 可惜的是，我们是两个世界的人。

sentences.en: Do I sound envious? I pity them, actually.
sentences.cn: 我听起来是嫉妒吗？实际上我是可怜他们。

sentences.en: He was inclined to self-pity.
sentences.cn: 他总是自怜自叹。

sentences.en: His tired mind continued to wallow in self-pity.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫的心继续沉溺于自哀自怜之中。

sentences.en: I hated the thought of being an object of pity (= someone who other people feel sorry for ) .
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢被人怜悯。

sentences.en: I like Charlie. Pity he had to marry that awful woman.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢查利，遗憾的是他得和那个糟糕的女人结婚。

sentences.en: I listened to Jason’s story with pity.
sentences.cn: 我同情地听贾森讲述他的故事。

sentences.en: I listened to Jason’s story with pity. ＃
sentences.cn: 我同情地听贾森讲述他的故事。

sentences.en: I pity anyone who has to feed a family on such a low income.
sentences.cn: 我同情那些得依靠如此微薄的收入养活全家的人。

sentences.en: It seemed a pity to let it all go to waste.
sentences.cn: 让这一切白白浪费掉，真是可惜了。

sentences.en: It’s a great pity Joyce wasn’t invited.
sentences.cn: 乔伊斯没有受到邀请太遗憾了。

sentences.en: It's a pity you never got married, Sarah.
sentences.cn: 萨拉，你没结过婚真是遗憾啊。

sentences.en: Kozelek expresses his sense of desolation absolutely without self-pity.
sentences.cn: 科泽莱克不带一丝顾影自怜地表达了自己的凄凉悲怆之感。

sentences.en: Pity the poor teachers who have to deal with these kids.
sentences.cn: 同情一下那几位可怜的老师吧，他们不得不和这些孩子打交道。

sentences.en: Sam pitied his grandmother there alone, never going out.
sentences.cn: 萨姆很同情独自生活、从不出门的祖母。

sentences.en: She felt a stab of pity for him.
sentences.cn: 她突然对他心生同情。

sentences.en: She knew that she was an object of pity among her friends.
sentences.cn: 她知道自己是朋友们同情的对象。

sentences.en: She saw no pity in their faces.
sentences.cn: 她从他们的脸上看不到慈悲。

sentences.en: She summoned up all her pity for him, to smother her self-pity.
sentences.cn: 她抑制着心中的自怜，将满腔的怜悯之情都倾注在了他的身上。

sentences.en: Supposedly his last words to her were: "You must not pity me."
sentences.cn: 据说他对她说的最后一句话是：“别怜悯我。”

sentences.en: the old couple &B{took pity on} him and gave him food.
sentences.cn: 这对老夫妇同情他，给他东西吃。

sentences.en: What a pity that his career was left to flounder.
sentences.cn: 多么可惜，他的事业深陷困局。
